text:
@SenateGOP @senatemajldr 1/2
The Senate GOP coronavirus relief bill includes an $8B procurement/acquisition effort, including:
—$1B for Navy P-8 planes
—$2B for F-35s, C-130Js and the A-10 wing replacement
—$2.2B for shipbuilding
